mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (orderid, userid, orderdate, shipaddr1,shipaddr2, shipzip, shipPhone, shipCellphone) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{username}, #{orderDate}, #{shipAddress1}, #{shipAddress2}, #{shipZip}, #{shipPhone},#{shipCellphone})
INSERT INTO orderstatus (orderid, linenum, timestamp, status) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{lineNumber}, #{timestamp}, #{status})
mapper.select:
SELECT O.orderid AS order_orderid, O.userid AS order_userid, O.orderdate AS order_orderdate, O.shipaddr1 AS order_shipaddr1, O.shipaddr2 AS order_shipaddr2, O.shipcity AS order_shipcity, O.shipstate AS order_shipstate, O.shipzip AS order_shipzip, O.shipPhone AS order_shipPhone, O.shipCellphone AS order_shipCellphone, O.shipcountry AS order_shipcountry, O.totalprice AS order_totalprice,
S.orderid AS orderstatus_orderid, S.linenum AS orderstatus_linenum, S.timestamp AS orderstatus_timestamp, S.status AS orderstatus_status,
L.orderid AS lineitem_orderid, L.linenum AS lineitem_linenum, L.itemid AS lineitem_itemid, L.quantity AS lineitem_quantity, L.unitprice AS lineitem_unitprice, (L.quantity * L.unitprice) AS lineitem_total FROM orders O LEFT OUTER JOIN orderstatus S ON O.orderid = S.orderid LEFT OUTER JOIN lineitem L ON O.orderid = L.orderid WHERE O.userid = #{userId} AND S.linenum = L.linenum ORDER BY O.orderid DESC, S.linenum ASC
